column1: Öga för öga, tand för tand.
column2: Eye for an eye, tooth for a tooth.
column3: Retaliation or punishment should take the same form as the original offense or crime.

column1: Ögonen vill ha mer än magen.
column2: The eye is bigger than the belly.
column3: Greed persuades a person to take more the he or she can manage.
